def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Business import Query registro = widget.Entity if registro == None: return
handleRegistro = registro.Fields["HANDLE"].ToString() if handleRegistro == "": return
sqlSituacaoDocumento = Query("SELECT SITUACAO FROM CN_CONTRATODOCUMENTOS WHERE HANDLE = ( SELECT DOCUMENTO FROM CN_DOCUMENTOVALIDADES WHERE HANDLE = " + registro.Fields["HANDLE"].ToString() + ") ")
situacaoDocumento = sqlSituacaoDocumento.Execute()
widget.View.Commands["CMD_ENVIARAPROVACAO"].Visible = situacaoDocumento[0]["SITUACAO"].GetString()=="P" widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = situacaoDocumento[0]["SITUACAO"].GetString()=="P"
